data.client_settings: Discord Canary 13228 & Discord Stable 13230 with Firefox 59.0.2
data.actual_result: The connection fails with a 400 Post Error and a visual failure error.
data.expected_result: The connection is successfully added and you are redirected to your client.
data.short_description: Adding a Steam Connection to Discord fails.
data.steps_to_repro: - Use Discord to attempt to add a Steam connection. - Authenticate with Steam.
